summary: Create a `@temporalio/doctor` CLI tool that can be executed via `npx` to diagnose and fix common configuration issues in Temporal TypeScript SDK projects, such as version mismatches, unexpected package hoisting, deprecated dependencies, and known bugs.
userImpact: Users struggling with configuration issues would be able to quickly diagnose and fix common problems with their Temporal SDK setup.
proposedFix: Develop a @temporalio/doctor CLI program that can scan package.json, lock files, and node_modules directories to detect version mismatches, hoisting issues, deprecated packages, and known bugs, while also providing functionality to update/set version numbers on all @temporalio/* dependencies.
keyQuote: We could develop a `@temporalio/doctor` CLI program, meant to be executed using `npx` or similar, that provides various commands to diagnose and fix some common configuration issues
